name: Anastasia
description:
Back of Jewel Case - Playstation (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

A princess of the Russian royal family, Anastasia's life is changed forever when the traitor, Rasputin, takes her father's throne. Her memory lost, Anastasia must flee the palace with Alexander, a young soldier.

As well as a great half-hour cartoon video, Anastasia features an easy-to-use virtual colouring book and a challenging puzzle game.

Can the princess escape?
